newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Labouchere raises HBG to a Buy.
newsitem.headline: Labouchere raises HBG to a Buy.

text.p: Company announced takeovers of Britain's Higgs & Hill and Germany's Ways & Freytag in December. Although both firms are expected to suffer a loss in 1996, we consider acquisitions reasonably priced. HBG shares by all means cheap. Prospective PE is among lowest in the sector and represent a 34 percent discount to the AEX-index. 12-month target is 450 guilders.
